category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment:
•For tariff heading 0101 excluded race horses.
•For tariff heading 0106, reduced rate applies only on rabbits, pigeons, quail, pheasants, partridges, hares and other animals and birds, live, intended for human consumption. Animals set are reared for fur. Bees. Mites (insects used in crops instead of pesticides).
•For tariff heading 0301, excluded live fish for decoration

code.description: Human blood; animal blood prepared for therapeutic, prophylactic or diagnostic uses; antisera, other blood fractions and immunological products, whether or not modified or obtained by means of biotechnological processes; vaccines, toxins, cultures of micro-organisms (excluding yeasts) and similar products; cell cultures, whether or not modified

category.description: Pharmaceutical products used for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and female sanitary protection, and absorbent hygiene products

vatRateResults.comment: Zero rate is applied only on vaccines  for the prevention and diagnosis of Covid-19 disease for tariff heading 3002

Pumps for liquids, whether or not fitted with a measuring device; liquid elevators

category.description: Certain agricultural tools and equipment

code.description: Hand tools, the following: spades, shovels, mattocks, picks, hoes, forks and rakes; axes, billhooks and similar hewing tools; secateurs and pruners of any kind; scythes, sickles, hay knives, hedge shears, timber wedges and other tools of a kind used in agriculture, horticulture or forestry
Pumps for liquids, whether or not fitted with a measuring device; liquid elevators

Machinery, plant or laboratory equipment, whether or not electrically heated (excluding furnaces, ovens and other equipment of heading 8514), for the treatment of materials by a process involving a change of temperature such as heating, cooking, roasting, distilling, rectifying, sterilising, pasteurising, steaming, drying, evaporating, vaporising, condensing or cooling, other than machinery or plant of a kind used for domestic purposes; instantaneous or storage water heaters, non-electric

Mechanical appliances (whether or not hand-operated) for projecting, dispersing or spraying liquids or powders; fire extinguishers, whether or not charged; spray guns and similar appliances; steam or sandblasting machines and similar jet projecting machines
Agricultural, horticultural or forestry machinery for soil preparation or cultivation; lawn or sports-ground rollers

Other agricultural, horticultural, forestry, poultry-keeping or bee-keeping machinery, including germination plant fitted with mechanical or thermal equipment; poultry incubators and brooders

Machines for cleaning, sorting or grading seed, grain or dried leguminous vegetables; machinery used in the milling industry or for the working of cereals or dried leguminous vegetables, other than farm-type machinery

category.description: Certain agricultural tools and equipment

vatRateResults.comment: For tariff headings 2844, 3006, 3002, 3822 and 3824 reduced rate applies only on radioactive, shadow and other preparations or reagents for human medicine (for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes). After the cease of EU Directive 2020/2020 on 31/12/2022, the diagnostic rapid and PCR tests are also included in tariff heading 3822 .

Also, reduced rate applies on music handwritten or printed, illustrated or not, whether or not bound of tariff heading 4904.

code.description: Passenger rail transport services, interurban
Taxi services
Interurban scheduled road transport services of passengers
Sea and coastal passenger water transport services
Passenger air transport services

category.description: Transport of passengers and the transport of goods accompanying them, such as luggage, bicycles, including electric bicycles, motor or other vehicles, or the supply of services relating to the transport of passengers

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate applies ONLY to transport of passengers and their luggage.

code.description: Hotel and similar accommodation services
Holiday and other short stay accommodation services
Camping ground, recreational and vacation camp services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: In this category, also the short-term accommodation (airbnb type) is included, only in the case where the lessor is (a) a legal entity or (b) natural person, who shall supply at least 3 immovable properties (e.g. house, flat, rooms in a flat etc) in order to be included. In ALL other cases of short-term accommodation (i.e. NATURAL persons that supply 1 or 2 immovable properties) this service is VAT exempted.

code.description: Food and beverage serving services

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment:
The reduced rate (RR) applies to restaurant and catering services, excluding night clubs. 

Moreover, the RR applies to the delivery or take-away of non-alcoholic beverages (nAB) from companies that are dealing with restaurant and catering services. 

The standard rate still applies to alcoholic beverages IN ANY CASE (i.e. serving, delivery or take away) and ONLY in the serving of nAB

code.description: Plants and parts of plants (including seeds and fruits), of a kind used primarily in perfumery, in pharmacy or for insecticidal, fungicidal or similar purposes, fresh, chilled, frozen or dried, whether or not cut, crushed or powdered

code.description: Locust beans, seaweeds and other algae, sugar beet and sugar cane, fresh, chilled, frozen or dried, whether or not ground; fruit stones and kernels and other vegetable products (including unroasted chicory roots of the variety Cichorium intybus sativum) of a kind used primarily for human consumption, not elsewhere specified or included

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

Pits and almonds fruits and other vegetable products (including roots) chicory, not roasted, of the variety CICHORIUM INTYBUS SATIVUM), which mainly for human consumption and not named nor are they included elsewhere

code.description: Lac; natural gums, resins, gum-resins and oleoresins (for example, balsams)
Sunflower-seed, safflower or cotton-seed oil and fractions thereof, whether or not refined, but not chemically modified
Other fixed vegetable or microbial fats and oils (including jojoba oil) and their fractions, whether or not refined, but not chemically modified
Animal, vegetable or microbial fats and oils and their fractions, partly or wholly hydrogenated, inter-esterified, re-esterified or elaidinised, whether or not refined, but not further prepared

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment:
•For tariff heading 1301 reduced rate applies only on mastic (white or not) raw
•For tariff headings 1512,1515 reduced rate applies only on soybean oil, peanut oil, sunflower oil, cotton oil (cottonseed oil), corn oil, sesame oil and their fractions, whether or not refined but not chemically transformed
•For tariff heading 1516 reduced rate applies only on edible mixtures or preparations of animal fats or oils or vegetable or from fractions of various fats or oils of Chapter 15

Fruit or nut juices (including grape must and coconut water) and vegetable juices, unfermented and not containing added spirit, whether or not containing added sugar or other sweetening matter
